title: rBezos Bested By Billionaire, Gold Medal For Discrimination! 7.6.21
itunes:title: rBezos Bested By Billionaire, Gold Medal For Discrimination! 7.6.21
description:
In episode 944, Jack and Miles are joined by Left Handed Radio's Anna Rubanova to discuss the Sha'Carri Richardson missing the Olympic 100 because of a positive marijuana test, Richard Branson going to space before Jeff Bezos, Norway's new influencer law, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Marijuana’s racist history shows the need for comprehensive drug reform
  2. Rising U.S. Track Star Sha’Carri Richardson Tests Positive for Marijuana, Could Miss Tokyo Olympics
  3. Richardson will miss Olympic 100 after marijuana test
  4. RICHARD BRANSON: MY SPACE FLIGHT IS BOOKED ... 9 Days Ahead of Bezos!!!
  5. Norway Law Forces Influencers to Label Retouched Photos on Instagram
  6. LISTEN: DJ ST THOMAS - 323

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
